statements: DELETE FROM PestInfestationData WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND environment_id = 2;
DELETE FROM PestInfestationData WHERE environment_id = 2 AND pest_type = 'ants';
DELETE FROM environmental_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM environmental_conditions WHERE humidity > 70 AND sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM pests_table WHERE infestation_level > 5)
DELETE FROM PestIdentification WHERE id = 1 AND sensor_id = 5;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE humidity > 80.5 AND timestamp < '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND pest_id = 2;
